tests.name: Test Case cc-01 Verification of date operation
tests.summary: Test operation and verify correct display of button element. In accordance with the specifications and models provided.
tests.preconditions: The page must be opened in any browser https://radekjelen.github.io/currency-converter-React/
tableRows: the element is correctly displayed on the page
verify the action of the date
day of the week corresponds to the current day
verify the action of the date
number of the day of the month shall correspond to the current day
verify the action of the date
month is consistent with the current month.
